notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Epidemiological data used in the study can be obtained from the French Institute for Public Health Surveillance ( www.invs.sante.fr) contacting the scientific coordinator of Antilles-Guyane Regional Epidemiology unit ( ARS-MARTINIQUE-CIRE@ars.sante.fr). Population data are available from the "Institut National de la Statistiques et des Etudes Economiques" ( www.insee.fr). Climatic and meteorological data are available from the European Centre for Medium- Range Weather Forecasts accessible from http://apps.ecmwf.int/datasets/data/interim-full-daily/levtype=sfc/ and Meteo-France ( www.meteofrance.com).
